Comment.Language: From the Feast of the Ascension of our Lord to the 49th day of the Pentecost Period:

Text.Language: A Pi,~rictoc Pennou] twnf e~bolqen n/eymwout: ouoh afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui: afhemci caouinam m~Pefiwt.
Christ our God is risen from the dead and has ascended into the heavens, and is seated at the right hand of His Father.
المسيح الهنا قام من الأموات، وصعد إلي السموات وجلس عن يمين ابيه.
